Variants.Name: Suspicious Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
Variants.Description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. At first glance it's hard to tell which is which.
Variants.Effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
Variants.Description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. Fresh poultry is complimented by fragrant mushrooms. Don't be picky, chow down!
Variants.Effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Delicious Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
Variants.Description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. All the best the wild has to offer are pierced on just one stick.
Variants.Effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Fruity Skewers
Variants.Description: Kaeya's specialty. A chewy skewer with a rich sweet aftertaste. Wait... Is this really the smell of fruit?
Variants.Effect: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Teyvat Fried Egg
Variants.Description: An egg fried on one side. A bit hard in the middle. One can only hope it still has its nutrients.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

Variants.Name: Teyvat Fried Egg
Variants.Description: An egg fried on one side. The yolk flows out nicely when broken. So satisfying.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

Variants.Name: Delicious Teyvat Fried Egg
Variants.Description: An egg fried on one side. With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

Variants.Name: Teyvat Charred Egg
Variants.Description: Bennett's specialty. For some reason, every single fried egg is a little burnt around the edges. That said, the burnt crisp does lends a whole new flavor to the dish.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Steak
Variants.Description: A grilled steak. Its color is a little bleak, almost as if it feels sorry for itself for being a sorry excuse for a steak.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

Variants.Name: Steak
Variants.Description: A grilled steak. High heat has locked the juices in, giving one high expectations for when the meat is cut open.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

Variants.Name: Delicious Steak
Variants.Description: A grilled steak. Juicy, flavorsome, fragrant steak. One bite and you feel yourself come alive.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

Variants.Name: Outrider's Champion Steak!
Variants.Description: Amber's specialty. One side is obviously uncooked. The other side gives off a subtle scent of something burnt. Close your eyes and have a big mouthful, just to keep Amber happy if nothing else.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Radish Veggie Soup
Variants.Description: Radish-based vegetable soup. The vegetables within appear to have been victims of a frost.
Variants.Effect: Restores 8% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 210 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Radish Veggie Soup
Variants.Description: Radish-based vegetable soup. Its flavor is delicately between tart and sweet. With luscious radish, it's a well-balanced dish.
Variants.Effect: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 260 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Delicious Radish Veggie Soup
Variants.Description: Radish-based vegetable soup. The clear aromas are perfectly accompanied by a sunny summer afternoon.
Variants.Effect: Restores 10% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Mondstadt Grilled Fish
Variants.Description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire. Sadly, it's a bit too well done. The charred smell and the dry texture are not too impressive.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

Variants.Name: Mondstadt Grilled Fish
Variants.Description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, making it completely dry and crispy. The sprinkled pepper on top brings out the freshness of the fish.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

Variants.Name: Delicious Mondstadt Grilled Fish
Variants.Description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, locking the delicious juice inside the meat under the crispy skin. A small bite is all that's needed to unlock its wondrous and delicious taste.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

Variants.Name: Definitely Not Bar Food!
Variants.Description: Diona's specialty. The fish skin is crisp, and the meat is sumptuous. Only someone with a sufficiently great love for fish would be able to bring out such lovely flavors. Now, if only there were something to drink to go with it... Uh-oh, she's looking this way!
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Mint Jelly
Variants.Description: A refreshing dessert. Some little accidents occurred during the making of this dish, causing the jelly to emerge unevenly frozen. Well, it could still serve should you want to drink some mint cordial...
Variants.Effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Mint Jelly
Variants.Description: A refreshing dessert. The steps to making this are quite simple indeed, and when it slides down your throat, the faint, fresh flavor of mint will leave you feeling reinvigorated for the rest of the day.
Variants.Effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Delicious Mint Jelly
Variants.Description: A refreshing dessert. The perfect springiness makes for a lovely sight indeed when you strike it with the back of a small spoon. Taste that spoonful and that cool and refreshing feel will spread through your mouth instantly, dispelling any negative emotions you may harbor to the point where you feel like you've become a new person.
Variants.Effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Mora Meat
Variants.Description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. The tough pastry shell almost seems to sally out against your teeth as you bite into it. If you fight through the greasiness and only chew on the minced meat, you can sort of taste its flavor.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

Variants.Name: Mora Meat
Variants.Description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. When you split the pastry in two, minced meat spills out. The taste of meat grease is all but gone, and the baking process has brought out the sweetness of the pastry. Such pastries are usually stamped with the word "Mora," all the better to represent wealth and fortune.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

Variants.Name: Delicious Mora Meat
Variants.Description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. With a crispy crust and tender meat, this legendary delicacy is so succulent that not even Mora laid in front of you could distract you from enjoying it.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

Variants.Name: Qiankun Mora Meat
Variants.Description: Ningguang's specialty. The pastry is perfectly soft and waxy, as is the consistency of the meat, and the honey-like meat juices ooze out as you squeeze it. Wherever did the high and mighty Tianquan Lady Ningguang learn to make this dish?
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Stir-Fried Filet
Variants.Description: Slices of meat stir-fried on high heat — but for so long that they are now indistinguishable from the accompanying Jueyun Chili. Best served with rice, if served at all.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

Variants.Name: Stir-Fried Filet
Variants.Description: Sliced meat flash-fried in a wok. The mild Jueyun Chili adds just the right amount of kick to the delicious aroma of the meat. Perfect as an appetizer and also goes well with rice.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

Variants.Name: Delicious Stir-Fried Filet
Variants.Description: Slices of meat stir-fried on high heat. The spiciness is as a blaze amidst a field of snow that ignites your appetite and leaves you craving more.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

Variants.Name: Flash-Fried Filet
Variants.Description: Beidou's specialty. They say that Beidou once learned some tricks from Xiangling, making some refinements and adding more flavor to this dish. If you can clean it out in one go, perhaps you might impress her.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Grilled Tiger Fish
Variants.Description: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. You can barely see that this charred lump is indeed grilled fish, and upon further investigation, the fish scales mixed in confirm that this is indeed the case.
Variants.Effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Grilled Tiger Fish
Variants.Description: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The fish is a fresh catch straight from the harbor, lightly seasoned and swiftly grilled. Its aroma attracts the street cats. Indeed, freshness is the secret of flavor.
Variants.Effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Delicious Grilled Tiger Fish
Variants.Description: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The shimmering golden skin has locked the fresh and tender meat in. You cannot help but sigh in satisfaction as you chew on it. Not a scrap of meat here will go uneaten, not even those stuck firmly to the bamboo stick.
Variants.Effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Survival Grilled Fish
Variants.Description: Keqing's specialty. This dish was not grilled. Instead, it was fried from within through the delicate application of Electro. A gentle bite reveals fragrant fish under the lightly charred skin, its taste perfectly balanced. So, is this how she survives in the wild? You really can't judge a book by its cover.
Variants.Effect: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Rice Buns
Variants.Description: Soft and fluffy buns. The dough has not been proofed properly, meaning the buns did not puff up evenly during the steaming process. The resulting coarse, hard texture leaves much to be desired.
Variants.Effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Rice Buns
Variants.Description: Soft and fluffy buns. The rice and horsetail have been ground into flour and kneaded into dough before being placed into a steaming basket. They can be eaten as-is or with a vegetable filling. Portable and satiating, it is a very popular dish in the Liyue region.
Variants.Effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Delicious Rice Buns
Variants.Description: Soft and fluffy buns. The unique sweetness of the whole grains passes between your teeth and lips as you chew. The relatively nondescript ingredients have been transformed into a true delicacy by your labors. This is one of the simple pleasures of the common folk and tastes best after some good, honest work.
Variants.Effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Flaming Red Bolognese
Variants.Description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. A bit chewy and annoyingly sticks to your teeth.
Variants.Effect: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Flaming Red Bolognese
Variants.Description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The meaty, herby aroma really gets your appetite going.
Variants.Effect: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Delicious Flaming Red Bolognese
Variants.Description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The beautiful, authentic flavors take you on a culinary adventure from the first bite to the last.
Variants.Effect: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Mysterious Bolognese
Variants.Description: Lisa's specialty. With an inexplicable aura, this bolognese is so exotic that you can never have enough. Did she actually enchant it with some kind of magic?
Variants.Effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Sweet Madame
Variants.Description: Honey-roasted fowl. The sweet flowers have been burnt off, revealing the bitter taste of the overcooked fowl.
Variants.Effect: Restores 20% of Max HP and an additional 900 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Sweet Madame
Variants.Description: Honey-roasted fowl. The honey and sweet flowers come together to complement the tender fowl meat.
Variants.Effect: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Delicious Sweet Madame
Variants.Description: Honey-roasted fowl. Tender and sweet, the meat has perfectly fused with the honey, ensuring the only thing left of this dish will be the cleanly-picked bones.
Variants.Effect: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Dinner of Judgment
Variants.Description: Rosaria's specialty. The seemingly dark thorns make it hard to know how to begin tucking in. After some effort, you manage to clear the ornamentation away... and to your surprise, the first taste of the tender chicken unveils a shockingly lovely taste. As Rosaria studies your reaction, she seems pleased.
Variants.Effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 1,750 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Northern Smoked Chicken
Variants.Description: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. It's true. You really ought to try your own cooking before serving it to your guests. It's not too late to make a new one, perhaps?
Variants.Effect: Restores 40 Stamina

Variants.Name: Northern Smoked Chicken
Variants.Description: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. A staple for Northerners, often made for honored guests.
Variants.Effect: Restores 50 Stamina

Variants.Name: Delicious Northern Smoked Chicken
Variants.Description: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. A dish fit for a king. Go on, find one and serve him with pride.
Variants.Effect: Restores 60 Stamina

Variants.Name: Suspicious Cream Stew
Variants.Description: A meat and vegetable stew. Surprisingly dry for something that's meant to have liquid.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Cream Stew
Variants.Description: A meat and vegetable stew. The thick juices taste great with the tender meat and vegetables.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Cream Stew
Variants.Description: A meat and vegetable stew. These warm, buttery ingredients are so good that you almost want to dive into the cream stew and cuddle up with them.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Spicy Stew
Variants.Description: Barbara's specialty. Carrots cut into cute little stars make this dish... Wait, AHH, where did this spiciness come from!?
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 1500s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Tea Break Pancake
Variants.Description: A stack of round pancakes. A burnt scent masks what you can only assume should be a sweet taste. The berries are the only thing saving this dish.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.

Variants.Name: Tea Break Pancake
Variants.Description: A stack of round pancakes. A staple originating from afternoon tea in manors. Only the best berries should be picked for this dish.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.

Variants.Name: Delicious Tea Break Pancake
Variants.Description: A stack of round pancakes. Tender and fluffy, the sweet-smelling pancakes taste like clouds. A heavenly delicacy, no doubt.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.

Variants.Name: Lighter-Than-Air Pancake
Variants.Description: Noelle's specialty. These thick pastries are the special afternoon snacks of the Knights of Favonius. They give people the sense that they have fallen upon a layer of fluffy clouds, and seeing Noelle's smile makes the feeling all the sweeter!
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 15% of Max HP, then restores an additional 550 HP.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Fried Radish Balls
Variants.Description: Fried Radish Balls. Way too oily, and leaves you looking for something to drink to cut through the grease.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 66 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Fried Radish Balls
Variants.Description: Fried Radish Balls. Fragrant and crispy. Make sure to eat them while they're hot! Said to be a recipe from Liyue.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 81 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Fried Radish Balls
Variants.Description: Fried Radish Balls. It's insane that something so delicious comes from plain old radishes! All who eat them will truly understand Liyue's culinary reputation.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 95 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Satisfying Salad
Variants.Description: A vegetable salad. Regrettably, it seems the best time to plate the potatoes and boiled eggs was missed.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Satisfying Salad
Variants.Description: A vegetable salad. Not just steamed potatoes and fresh vegetables, but also a hard-boiled egg to top it off. Satisfying to both the eyes and stomach.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 9% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Satisfying Salad
Variants.Description: A vegetable salad. Fresh, light, and varied. You'd never get tired of eating this, even if you had to eat it for the rest of your life.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 12% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Der Weisheit Letzter Schluss (Life)
Variants.Description: Mona's specialty. A great work from a great astrologer. Its greatest aspect lies with its cost-effectiveness in filling one's stomach.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 16% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Fisherman's Toast
Variants.Description: Onion-covered toast. Not quite cooked right. You'll notice its imperfection, even if you eat it while fishing.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 88 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Fisherman's Toast
Variants.Description: Onion-covered toast. A favorite amongst fishermen, they will stuff a bag with it and sit by the river all day.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 107 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Fisherman's Toast
Variants.Description: Onion-covered toast. Exudes a wonderful aroma. Are the fish biting for the bait, or is it the toast they're after?
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 126 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Fish-Flavored Toast
Variants.Description: Klee's specialty. By way of apology for wantonly using her bombs to scare away the fish, Jean instructed Klee to make this toast for the fishermen. It's filling and tasty. Klee will never starve again, even after a whole day of blast fishing.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 151 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Goulash
Variants.Description: A steaming-hot stew. There was some flaw in the flame control during the stewing process, leading to a product with a very stiff mouthfeel. You can ignore those flaws if you scarf it all down — it'll keep the cold away regardless.
Variants.Effect: Slightly decreases the rate of Sheer Cold accumulation for all party members for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Goulash
Variants.Description: Hot stew made from Chilled Meat and vegetables chopped into small pieces. Slow-boiled tomatoes give this dish a rich and thick texture. Filling one's stomach with this comforting mixture has a warming effect.
Variants.Effect: Somewhat decreases the rate of Sheer Cold accumulation for all party members for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Goulash
Variants.Description: A steaming-hot stew. Just one spoonful sends a down-to-earth sense of satisfaction welling up from the depths of your heart. The meat's flavor grows with every chew, bringing limitless strength to the eater even in the coldest wintry wastes.
Variants.Effect: Decreases the rate of Sheer Cold accumulation for all party members for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Fragrant Mashed Potatoes
Variants.Description: Seasoned mashed potatoes. Some unmashed chunks have been mixed into the lot, adding a measure of unwanted randomness to the dish.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Fragrant Mashed Potatoes
Variants.Description: Seasoned mashed potatoes. The potatoes were thoroughly mashed before a sauce was drizzled over them. The mouthfeel is soft and smooth and it has a rich, multi-layered flavor profile. A satisfying choice for a hungry stomach, whether as a side or as a main dish.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Fragrant Mashed Potatoes
Variants.Description: Seasoned mashed potatoes. As you take a bite of this fine potato mash, an intense flavor develops on your tongue that is mixed with its natural freshness and the taste of dairy. Such a graceful flavor can hardly be thought to have emerged from an ingredient as plebeian as potatoes.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Almond Tofu
Variants.Description: A dessert made from ground almonds. The almond milk is chilled without being properly ground and strained. You can only lie to yourself that its rough texture is what makes it special.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 66 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Almond Tofu
Variants.Description: A dessert made out of almond. It has a silky-smooth texture with a long-lasting aroma of almond. It's named tofu only because of its tofu-like shape.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 81 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Almond Tofu
Variants.Description: A dessert made from ground almonds. It has the exquisite look and texture of a piece of white jade, and could pass as an art piece — so much so that you could not entertain the idea of actually eating it.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 95 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: "Sweet Dream"
Variants.Description: Xiao's specialty. His dream is very simple, and it is merely a lovely dream.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 114 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Jueyun Chili Chicken
Variants.Description: Chicken in a dressing, served cold. The chicken probably isn't properly marinated, so it's only salty on the outside but bland on the inside. The taste reminds you of water-poached chicken breasts.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Jueyun Chili Chicken
Variants.Description: Chicken in a dressing, served cold. The way the dish has been prepared captures the succulence of the chicken perfectly. Beneath the glowing gold skin, the meat has a mildly hot flavor.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 9% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Jueyun Chili Chicken
Variants.Description: Chicken in a dressing, served cold. The chicken is extremely tender, juicy, and sweet. The delicious taste transports you to the realm of dreams.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 12% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Rockin' Riffin' Chicken!
Variants.Description: Xinyan's specialty. Its demonic appearance hides an absolutely demonic spiciness. Eat it, tear up, eat some more, and don't stop till you drop! Surely only a demon could have invented such a dish!
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 16% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Jewelry Soup
Variants.Description: A simple vegetable soup. The bland soup and dull vegetables remind you of the dying vegetables on abandoned and barren farmlands.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 88 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Jewelry Soup
Variants.Description: A simple vegetable soup. Snapdragon, tofu, and lotus seeds are put into boiling water and simmered. Jewelry Soup earned its luxurious name from the look of the ingredients used, but contrary to its name, the soup is commonly prepared and served in ordinary households.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 107 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Jewelry Soup
Variants.Description: A simple vegetable soup. The mild-tasting soup is filled with the fragrance of fresh vegetables. This down-to-earth and heart-warming soup can rival any luxurious dish.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 126 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Matsutake Meat Rolls
Variants.Description: A pan-fried meat dish. Though the dry and tough texture is miles away from what it could be, the Matsutake is too nutritious to let it go to waste.
Variants.Effect: Restores 20% of Max HP and an additional 900 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Matsutake Meat Rolls
Variants.Description: A pan-fried meat dish. Ground meat is put on the Matsutake and gently pan-fried on low heat so the Matsutake can fully take in the aromatic juice of the meat. It's a mouthwatering delicacy in all of its glory.
Variants.Effect: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Delicious Matsutake Meat Rolls
Variants.Description: A pan-fried meat dish. It combines the essences of the mountains and the nourishments of the celestial bodies. It is a very nutritious dish that will surely bring a smile to your face.
Variants.Effect: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Crystal Shrimp
Variants.Description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The dull outer skin has a rather sticky mouthfeel which, when combined with the dry stuffing within, makes this dish a torment best ended sooner.
Variants.Effect: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Crystal Shrimp
Variants.Description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The stuffing is taken from whole fresh shrimp, and the glistening quality of the flour can be guessed at from the translucence of the outer skin. Has a springy, tasty chew.
Variants.Effect: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Delicious Crystal Shrimp
Variants.Description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The outer skin is as clear its crystal namesake, and when it enters the mouth, one's tongue could be forgiven for thinking that the fresh shrimp within is still alive. Those who eat it can only lament that four pieces per serving is far, far too few.
Variants.Effect: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: All-Delicacy Parcels
Variants.Description: Xingqiu's specialty. This dish's almost artisan appearance makes one almost reluctant to tuck in. But once you get a taste, its fresh, light and lovely sweetness will make the dish hard to put down.... Hang on a moment. Did he throw the carrots out, by any chance?
Variants.Effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
Variants.Description: A steamed egg dish. The lengthy steaming process has caused unusual honeycomb figure to appear on the surface of the egg custard. It goes without saying that there isn't hardly a hint of bitterness left in the lotus.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
Variants.Description: A steamed egg dish. The clear, gold colors of the egg custard have been embellished with several lotus roots. Regardless of whether it is breakfast or a post-meal snack, its superior nutritional value can greatly nourish the body.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
Variants.Description: A steamed egg dish. The succulent eggs melt right in your mouth, and before you know it, a smooth and subtle sweetness of newly sprung lotus flowers covers your tastebuds.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Golden Shrimp Balls
Variants.Description: A deep-fried shrimp dish. Hastily cast into hot oil and promptly forgotten about, the result is a disastrous combination of raw shrimp and burnt potato strips.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.

Variants.Name: Golden Shrimp Balls
Variants.Description: A deep-fried shrimp dish. The aroma assaults your senses, while the crispy potatoes bring out the light sweetness of the shrimp meat. This, in tandem with its cute, small shape, makes it very enticing indeed.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 1200 HP.

Variants.Name: Delicious Golden Shrimp Balls
Variants.Description: A deep-fried shrimp dish. From the rich, indulgent scent of crispy golden potato strips, to the satisfying crunch as you take your first bite, to the grand finale of delicious sweet shrimp, this dish is pure pleasure.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 1500 HP.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
Variants.Description: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The moisture has been sucked right out of this dish, causing the noodles to become dry. You might choke on them even if you chew slowly.
Variants.Effect: Restores 40 Stamina

Variants.Name: Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
Variants.Description: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The sauce has a rustic flavor, and there's a generous amount of it mixed in with the noodles. A humble but enduringly popular dish.
Variants.Effect: Restores 50 Stamina

Variants.Name: Delicious Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
Variants.Description: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The seemingly ordinary noodles have absorbed the essence of the mountainous delicacies. A single mouthful is enough to taste its extreme freshness.
Variants.Effect: Restores 60 Stamina

Variants.Name: Cold Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
Variants.Description: Chongyun's specialty. Though these springy noodles would be irresistible in the sweltering summer, Chongyun insists on dining on them even in the chattering cold of winter. What a guy.
Variants.Effect: Restores 80 Stamina

Variants.Name: Suspicious Vegetarian Abalone
Variants.Description: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. The overly thick sauce has totally covered the freshness that the ingredients should have had, and the condiment leaves your mouth dry no matter how much you wash it down with water.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.

Variants.Name: Vegetarian Abalone
Variants.Description: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. The matsutake has been sliced thin and fried till golden before pouring the sauce. The matsutake meat is sumptuous and has flavor to match that of fresh abalone — almost enough to make you think it was the real thing.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.

Variants.Name: Delicious Vegetarian Abalone
Variants.Description: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. With the aid of the sauce, the matsutake has achieved an excellent, elegant mouth-feel that so rivals scallop in tenderness and abalone in freshness that you can hardly tell them apart. If you left your customer guessing before revealing the truth later, you would be sure to earn their astonished praise.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.

Variants.Name: Ghostly March
Variants.Description: Hu Tao's specialty. The round-faced ghouls seem quite cute, squeezed into a pile as they are. But if you were to fall to temptation and try but one of them, you may yet come to regret it for a long while... After all, this plate is full of top-quality, taste-bud-blasting— Actually, what on earth is this stuff, anyway?
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 15% of Max HP, then restores an additional 550 HP.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Stone Harbor Delicacies
Variants.Description: Wok-fried vegetarian food. Improper oil temperature control has caused the ingredients to reek of oil. Those who eat but a single bite will shake their heads and mourn the loss of the rare violetgrass used.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Stone Harbor Delicacies
Variants.Description: Wok-fried vegetarian food. A stir-fried selection of three ingredients hailing from Liyue. Though the methodology is simple, it brings out the intense, innate flavors of the ingredients, and does not fade in brilliance when compared to some high-class delicacy.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 9% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Stone Harbor Delicacies
Variants.Description: Wok-fried vegetarian food. The scents of the earth, the cool shade, and the moistness of the mist have all been enjoined into this plate of freshness. Pair it with simple white rice — both your taste buds and your soul shall experience a down-to-earth satisfaction many times over.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 12% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Mint Salad
Variants.Description: A fragrant salad dish. The Mint and Jueyun Chili have neither been matched nor incorporated well, which makes for a dish so spicy that any who eat it will be at a loss for words for a time.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 66 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Mint Salad
Variants.Description: A fragrant salad dish. Finely chopped Jueyun Chilis blended with a sauce and mixed with Mint leaves. It looks like nothing special, but it has surprisingly potent powers of refreshment and reinvigoration. It is also the perfect palate-cleanser after a greasy, indulgent meal.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 81 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Mint Salad
Variants.Description: A fragrant salad dish. The slightly bitter minty-fresh flavors do not cover the blazing mouthfeel of the Jueyun Chili but instead cause the spiciness to reach new heights. The two whirl and pirouette on your tongue like a pair of contending dancers to the hearty and vigorous applause of all.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 95 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Crab Roe Tofu
Variants.Description: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. Even the freshest crab roe cannot mask the taste of over-aged tofu. Crushing it up with your chopsticks and mixing it into white rice is all you can do to force it down your gullet.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.

Variants.Name: Crab Roe Tofu
Variants.Description: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. Crab roe is stir-fried till the oil within oozes out before being added to boiled tofu and accented with broth. Simple, yes, but gloriously fresh.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.

Variants.Name: Delicious Crab Roe Tofu
Variants.Description: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. The tofu is so tender that it might break if you blew on a spoonful of it. Each granule of the crab roe is plump and filled with crab oil that oozes out onto your lips the moment you have a single bite. Chewing is not needed at all. The food travels down your gullet in a flash, leaving nothing but the memory of its fresh flavor.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.

Variants.Name: "My Way"
Variants.Description: Yanfei's specialty is Crab Roe Tofu done to an incredible degree of regularity. Its dimensions and flavor are all faithfully rendered according to the "Crab Roe Tofu Laws" in the recipe, with not a single letter omitted.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 15% of Max HP, then restores an additional 550 HP.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Stir-Fried Fish Noodles
Variants.Description: A main dish with an intense flavor. You can barely tell where the rice noodles end and the fish begins. The soft, floppy mouthfeel is almost unbearable — how could something that looked this simple actually require so much craft?
Variants.Effect: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Stir-Fried Fish Noodles
Variants.Description: A main dish with an intense flavor. Created by stir-frying rice noodles, par-cooked fish, and various side dishes in a wok on high flame. The noodles, having absorbed the flavors of the various ingredients, are springy and smooth to the taste, making this dish a big hit with diners.
Variants.Effect: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Delicious Stir-Fried Fish Noodles
Variants.Description: A main dish with an intense flavor. The sumptuous, fresh look is already enough to leave people salivating, and one bite will surely lead to another. The smooth rice noodles and tender fish grant this meal a seat at any gourmet's table, its pedestrian ingredients notwithstanding.
Variants.Effect: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Calla Lily Seafood Soup
Variants.Description: A balanced combination of seafood. The bitterness of the calla lily, the astringency of the mint, the fishiness of the crab... Getting all the negatives together like this takes skill.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Calla Lily Seafood Soup
Variants.Description: A balanced combination of seafood. The delicacy of crab and mint make for a clear soup, and the calla lily brings it a refreshing taste.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Calla Lily Seafood Soup
Variants.Description: A balanced combination of seafood. The crab, mint, and Calla Lily come together perfectly to dance on your tongue. It reminds you of playing barefoot by the lake in summer.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: A Prize Catch
Variants.Description: Tartaglia's specialty. It looks like a trapped beast floundering in an ocean of blood, its death throes an inaudible scream... But Tartaglia smiles and explains that this is something he fished out of the sea, with some products from his homeland on the side.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 282 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Sautéed Matsutake
Variants.Description: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. A shame that control of the fire was lost. Best you can do now is try to trick people who didn't see you cooking it into thinking they are just potato chips.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Sautéed Matsutake
Variants.Description: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. Cooked in butter, it's crisp outside yet tender inside. Eat it before someone steals it from you.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Sautéed Matsutake
Variants.Description: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. So smooth and fragrant, eating them is like having the bursting vitality of spring absorbed into your stomach.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Cold Cut Platter
Variants.Description: A plate of cold cut meat. Seems a little too cold, probably not good for those with bad teeth or sensitive stomachs.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Cold Cut Platter
Variants.Description: A plate of cold cut meat. An equal balance of bacon, ham and sausage keeps everyone happy.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Cold Cut Platter
Variants.Description: A plate of cold cut meat. The seasoning is just delightful enough to bring out the flavors perfectly. With a mouth full of meaty ecstasy, one worries about nothing.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 40% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Die Heilige Sinfonie
Variants.Description: Fischl's specialty. The exquisite presentation doth seem to communicate some incomprehensible enigma. When partaking, if one were to gaze upon Fischl, one might see her expectant gaze peek through the gaps of her fingers, which she is using to cover half her face... Is this also part of the mystery?
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 55% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Sticky Honey Roast
Variants.Description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The sauce has stuck like glue to the meat, forming a homogeneous mass that tastes neither of honey nor meat.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Sticky Honey Roast
Variants.Description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The carrots take the gamey edge off the meat, and the sauce brings it all together sweetly. The perfect warm dish for a cold winter night.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Sticky Honey Roast
Variants.Description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The warm honey draws out the flavor of the meat, creating a flavor explosion akin to bathing in the warm summer sun.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake
Variants.Description: A somewhat luxurious bake. By looking at it, no-one can tell what it is made of... or what it lacks.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.

Variants.Name: Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake
Variants.Description: A luxurious bake. Cracks through the golden outer skin reveal a medley of rosy ham and bright vegetables. How tantalizing!
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 1200 HP.

Variants.Name: Delicious Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake
Variants.Description: A luxurious bake. The scent is so rich and heavenly. You'll only be done once you've licked the plate clean.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 1500 HP.

Variants.Name: Nutritious Meal (V.593)
Variants.Description: Sucrose's specialty. It looks like some strange alchemical product at first, but Sucrose insists that it is a healthy and nutritious meal, the result of many experiments and painstaking improvements. Its healthy green color comes from a mix of cream and natural vegetable juices... Wait, vegetable juices?
Variants.Effect: Revives the selected character and restores 20% of Max HP, then restores an additional 1500 HP.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Mushroom Pizza
Variants.Description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. If you can bite through the brick-like texture... At least it can ease your hunger.
Variants.Effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Mushroom Pizza
Variants.Description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. When still warm the cheese stretches out long, making it extremely satisfying to eat.
Variants.Effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Delicious Mushroom Pizza
Variants.Description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. It's a party in your mouth and the cheese and mushrooms invited all their delicious friends.
Variants.Effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Invigorating Pizza
Variants.Description: Jean's specialty. This pizza almost seems more art than food. Just one slice is enough to have you raring to go. Is this what keeps Jean working so hard?
Variants.Effect: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Mondstadt Hash Brown
Variants.Description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. It's said that a hash brown without jam is not worthy of the Mondstadt name... But is this even a hash brown?
Variants.Effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Mondstadt Hash Brown
Variants.Description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. A little bit of pinecone helps give it a nice crunch, and great with a bit of jam. Loved by people of all ages.
Variants.Effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Delicious Mondstadt Hash Brown
Variants.Description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. Close your eyes and feel the mild breeze and sweet dew that Mondstadt offers.
Variants.Effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Puppy-Paw Hash Brown
Variants.Description: Razor's specialty. Carefully shaped to resemble a wolf's paw. You can really feel the effort he has put into trying human cooking.
Variants.Effect: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Suspicious "Pile 'Em Up"
Variants.Description: A rich, meaty dish. The meat must have been stacked wrong... Yeah, that's it. Now, can this actually be served...?
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: "Pile 'Em Up"
Variants.Description: A rich, meaty dish. Originally a Mondstadt dish made of steaks, potatoes and cheese, it has since become synonymous with Ludi Harpastum.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 15% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious "Pile 'Em Up"
Variants.Description: A rich, meaty dish. Piled in just the right way to be both aesthetically pleasing and delicious all the way through. I wonder if we can pile it a little higher...
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: "Once Upon a Time in Mondstadt"
Variants.Description: Diluc's specialty. Feast your eyes and then your stomach upon this delicacy as the soft ribs melt in your mouth. Who knew Diluc was able to cook this well?
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% and CRIT DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s)

Variants.Name: Suspicious Barbatos Ratatouille
Variants.Description: A simple chowder with a long history. Thought the Anemo Archon is said to symbolize freedom, perhaps this dish has been a bit too liberal in the making. Perhaps the name Stormy Stew might be more fitting here.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Barbatos Ratatouille
Variants.Description: A simple chowder with a long history. The ingredients are similarly traditional and simple. No matter where you are, a piping-hot chowder of this sort can always give you a sense of real and unsurpassed satisfaction.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Barbatos Ratatouille
Variants.Description: A simple chowder with a long history. After much careful stewing, the flavors of three different vegetables have been blended to perfection. Like this, it is not hard to imagine why someone once called it "the best chowder I've ever tasted."
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: A Buoyant Breeze
Variants.Description: Venti's specialty. Other than the Cecilia flowers used for decoration, the ingredients are no different from normal. But if you taste it carefully, you can taste the flavor of "a wind that brings hope and tiny twists of fate." Perhaps... this is exactly what he wants.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 1800s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich
Variants.Description: A nutritious egg dish. The congealed mayonnaise is almost solid, and it is lined with tough ham and over-boiled egg. At least wolfing it down will make you full all the same.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich
Variants.Description: A nutritious egg dish. Luxurious mayonnaise sits atop a lining of ham and poached egg toast. The smooth mouthfeel fills you with energy for the long road ahead, and is one of the Adventurers' Guild's top-rated breakfasts.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich
Variants.Description: A nutritious egg dish. The mayonnaise rises like the sun over the rippling poached egg's surface, and the exquisite mouthfeel really hits the spot. The unique salty flavor of the ham cuts right through the mix as well, like light parting the gathered clouds.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Northern Apple Stew
Variants.Description: A dish with braised meat and apples. Apart from a slight sourness, it tastes just like any other down-to-earth braised meat dish, and lacks any fruity aroma. One might even wonder if the apples were put in there at all.
Variants.Effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Northern Apple Stew
Variants.Description: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat goes down smooth, its flavor dense, and when cut open, the meat juice that flows out bears traces of apple flavoring. An eye-popping, refreshing dish indeed.
Variants.Effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Delicious Northern Apple Stew
Variants.Description: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat is juicy in the extreme, and no matter how much of it you eat, you still want more. The way every breath you take is tinged with the flavor of apples reminds you of nothing so much as lying in an apple orchard.
Variants.Effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Sunshine Sprat
Variants.Description: Gently fried fish dish. The fish has been fried too long, which has deprived it of all its freshness and springiness. The slightest touch with your utensils might cause it to break into small pieces.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Sunshine Sprat
Variants.Description: Gently fried fish dish. Cooked with the right heat and duration to maintain freshness for a long time. Tender and flaky, it is delicately browned thanks to the layer of aromatic butter on top, which creates a multi-layered and unique flavor.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Sunshine Sprat
Variants.Description: Gently fried fish dish. The fish melts in your mouth, melding the flavors of land and sea together as it does, making for an unforgettable experience. Little wonder, then, that such a simply-made dish can make it into restaurants of great class.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Woodland Dream
Variants.Description: Albedo's specialty. The fruits and vegetables are laid out like grass, and they stand tall like trees. In this miniature world-in-a-plate, you circle the mottled city wall, follow brown alleys, and enter the light orange castle. A sweet, tender taste then bursts forth like a blooming flower. You open your eyes. There is a smile in the white-haired prince's eyes.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter
Variants.Description: An attractive-looking pre-meal snack. Too much time was unknowingly spent being preoccupied with the details of this dish's form. The potato slices that were meant to form the base have already turned soft, detracting greatly from the mouthfeel.
Variants.Effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter
Variants.Description: An attractive-looking pre-meal snack. A spread made from potatoes and berries is placed onto crispy potato slices, and a whole shrimp is then added on top. The fragrant and full-bodied flavors serve to whet the appetite, while the addition of Mint adds a whole other dimension to the mix.
Variants.Effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Delicious Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter
Variants.Description: An attractive-looking pre-meal snack. The moment this enters your mouth, the springiness of the shrimp and the crispiness of the potato slices form a profound contrast. The fluffy potatoes immediately follow up by melding these flavors together, creating a sweet experience that makes you relax, body and soul.
Variants.Effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Golden Chicken Burger
Variants.Description: A burger in which the fowl meat is the main star. The patty has been cut too thin and smeared with too much flour, causing it to taste like bread sandwiching more fried bread.
Variants.Effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Golden Chicken Burger
Variants.Description: A hamburger in which the fowl meat is the main star. The fluffy bread sandwiches slices of fresh vegetables and a flavorful, crispy fowl fillet. No utensils required here: Just grab it in your hands and bite down on that bundle of rich, satisfying succulence with a hearty "ker-runch!"
Variants.Effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Delicious Golden Chicken Burger
Variants.Description: A burger in which the fowl meat is the main star. The fowl fillet has been wrapped in gold and is so tender that you could almost squeeze the meat juices out. The dense flavor of the sauce and refreshing mouthfeel of the vegetables makes you feel like you're walking on clouds as you lose yourself in this feast lying in your palm.
Variants.Effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Zhongyuan Chop Suey
Variants.Description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Even if the dish was extremely delicious, it surely doesn't look the part. Even the most popular stalls would have trouble selling this.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Zhongyuan Chop Suey
Variants.Description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Though it contains animal organ meat and bits and scraps of other things, the strong-flavored seasonings have masked the stench of the meat. Many have had this dish for the entirety of their lives without knowing "chop suey" is actually a swear word in the local language.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Zhongyuan Chop Suey
Variants.Description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. The authentic "Liyue taste" of this aromatic dish makes it a comfort food for golden-agers that may bring a tear to their eyes.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Black-Back Perch Stew
Variants.Description: A poached fish dish. It has essentially lost all the taste of the fish itself to the spicy taste of the chili peppers. Only a selected few enjoy such a sensory overload on their tongues.
Variants.Effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Black-Back Perch Stew
Variants.Description: A poached fish dish. The fresh and tasty fish fillets are tender and juicy. The secret to this recipe is adding powdered Violetgrass into the heated oil to give the dish that aromatic scent. It's spicy, but not too spicy.
Variants.Effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Delicious Black-Back Perch Stew
Variants.Description: A poached fish dish. The fish fillets are so tender and juicy that they almost seem to come alive in your mouth. The sense of loss is so unbearable when you swallowed a piece down that you just had to treat yourself to another piece.
Variants.Effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Wanmin Restaurant's Boiled Fish
Variants.Description: Xiangling's specialty. This is the signature dish of the Wanmin Restaurant, combining Xiangling's heartfelt passion for cuisine. Anyone who tastes it will gain a pure appreciation for gourmet food amid the hearty and addictive blend of flavors.
Variants.Effect: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Squirrel Fish
Variants.Description: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. Sure, you can make out the shape of the fish, but you can't see how it's related to any squirrel. It just proves that the more complicated the dish is to prepare, the harder it is to prepare it well.
Variants.Effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Squirrel Fish
Variants.Description: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. The fish is first completely deboned before crisscross cuts are made on the skin. The fish is then coated in flour and deep-fried to a golden-brown color, then served with ketchup drizzled on top. It is tender and juicy on the inside and crispy on the outside. The dish resembles a squirrel's tail to a certain degree, hence the name.
Variants.Effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Delicious Squirrel Fish
Variants.Description: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. The fish is expertly handled to exhibit an elegant shape; however, the exquisitely balanced sweet-and-sour taste is really where the dish truly comes alive. The culinary skills involved in preparing this dish can impress even the greatest chefs of Liyue.
Variants.Effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Qingce Stir Fry
Variants.Description: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. This one was a failed test run, being unpleasantly bitter and uncomfortably spicy. You could try mixing it with rice — or you could simply discard it and eat the rice instead.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Qingce Stir Fry
Variants.Description: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. They say it was originally just a rustic dish that everyone in Qingce Village knew how to make. But quite unexpectedly, its crispy and spicy dishes gained the recognition of people from elsewhere, and thus began to spread throughout the Liyue region.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Qingce Stir Fry
Variants.Description: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. Just catching a whiff is enough to work up one's appetite. The tingle of chili titillates the tongue, leaving you ready to devour ten bowls in a single sitting.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Come and Get It
Variants.Description: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients... dumped into scalding-hot water and boiled beyond recognition. As if the taste of everything and nothing at the same time isn't bad enough, you'll want to watch out for the sand, too...
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Come and Get It
Variants.Description: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients. There is no great refinement in the making of this food, and it appears in Liyue often during festival season. Whenever this dish is served up, the person at the head of the table will invite everyone to dig in, saying "Come on, eat, eat," hence the name.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 15% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Come and Get It
Variants.Description: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients. The mixture of meat and vegetables is spot-on, the presentation is flawless, and the blend of flavors in the broth brings out the best of everything. Don't mind if I do.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: No Tomorrow
Variants.Description: Qiqi's specialty. The neat rows of ingredients seem at once exotic and delicious, and Baizhu says that Qiqi has spent a long time creating this dish. Still, once one considers that Qiqi has no sense of taste, just putting chopsticks to the food is going to take some courage.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% and CRIT DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s)

Variants.Name: Suspicious Bamboo Shoot Soup
Variants.Description: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. The inexpert heat control has caused the fresh meat to be a bit tough, and the salty ham has covered the expected taste. The bamboo shoots, which have absorbed the flavors of both meats, are probably the only acceptable part of this dish.
Variants.Effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Bamboo Shoot Soup
Variants.Description: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. The meat and ham have been diced into small pieces, and the soup has been kept on low heat till it turned milky white. The process has brought out the distinct flavors of both kinds of meat, making for an especially tasty soup.
Variants.Effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Delicious Bamboo Shoot Soup
Variants.Description: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. One whiff is enough to whet one's appetite greatly, and the concentrated flavors fill your body with every spoonful of soup. It is almost like spreading a pair of wings and walking on clouds.
Variants.Effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Slow-Cooked Bamboo Shoot Soup
Variants.Description: Zhongli's specialty. The ham is a butt end selected according to Yuehai Pavilion's gourmet standards. The fresh meat is pork belly, freshly hunted in Springvale, while the bamboo shoots are the densest you'll find in Qingce Village. It is then heated, slowly, gently, and with the utmost care and technique... Such a "particular" taste may only be shared with those who know how to appreciate it.
Variants.Effect: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Triple-Layered Consommé
Variants.Description: A neatly arranged dish. It certainly looks the part, but tasting it reveals the blandness of the consommé. Was it diluted too much, perhaps?
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Triple-Layered Consommé
Variants.Description: A neatly arranged dish. The Ham, Fowl, and Bamboo Shoots have been sliced into threads of equal length, and they've been laid out neatly in the soup bowl after being steamed at high heat, before being covered in consommé. The layers are distinct, and the mouthfeel is salty yet fresh.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Triple-Layered Consommé
Variants.Description: A neatly-arranged dish. The evenly-sized threads reveal exquisite knife-work. Rather than a dish, this seems more like a work of art. But once you work up the wherewithal to pick up those chopsticks and have at it, the delicious flavors will be utter bliss — leaving this as a mere work of art would be such a shame.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Lotus Flower Crisp
Variants.Description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The lotus petals have lost their original color, turning brown and wilted under the merciless heat of hot oil.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Lotus Flower Crisp
Variants.Description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. Sweet stuffed lotus wrapped in a crispy, deep-fried crust. Its layers of flower petals unravel perfectly in the palm of your hand.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Lotus Flower Crisp
Variants.Description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The flower petals waver to life if you gently blow on them. As you close your eyes and take a bite, a luscious flavor covers your tastebuds like a sweet harmony of blooming flowers and fluttering birds in the breeze.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Universal Peace
Variants.Description: Colorful staple food. Too much moisture was lost during the cooking process — at this point, it would take some imagination (and some extra water) to recoup the intended taste.
Variants.Effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Universal Peace
Variants.Description: Colorful staple food. Maintains perfect balance between soft and fragrant rice and all kinds of carefully selected sweet ingredients. This dish is mainly known for its meaning as a symbol of prosperity and peace, and less so for its taste. However, with such noble ideals behind it, its flavor should not disappoint.
Variants.Effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Delicious Universal Peace
Variants.Description: Colorful staple food. The sweet-and-sour preserved fruit is bound to the rich mouthfeel of the rice as if by invisible threads. Even after you swallow, the faint fragrance remains on your lips, increasing your sense of satisfaction by an order of magnitude.
Variants.Effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Prosperous Peace
Variants.Description: Ganyu's specialty. The image of a resting qilin is by itself enough to calm a person down. Ganyu has put her well-wishes for all that is lovely in this world into this dish — and she's saved some of her favorite Qingxin Flowers just for you, too.
Variants.Effect: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Jueyun Guoba
Variants.Description: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. The browned Jueyun Chilis and ham stick together on top of a crust that has barely retained its flavor, and you can only tell them apart by the mouthfeel.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Jueyun Guoba
Variants.Description: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. Stir-fried ham and Jueyun Chili sprinkled on a crispy crust made from Rice and Horsetail create a refined, meaty snack that transforms humble Rice into a hot delicacy.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Jueyun Guoba
Variants.Description: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. Chow down on that lovely, fragrant crust and the steaming ham sitting atop it. The spices and spiciness race neck and neck into your nostrils, creating an addictive flavor that has you licking that last finger rather than let a single scrap go to waste.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 40% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Fullmoon Egg
Variants.Description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The warped dough wraps the meat stiffly, and the dry mouthfeel leads to the illusion that one is chewing on a giant chunk of gnocchi.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.

Variants.Name: Fullmoon Egg
Variants.Description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The egg has been beaten into the flour to form a dough and the shrimp and fish have been diced, minced, and packaged into the shape of a teacup, before being garnished with whole shrimp and steamed in a pot. The resulting design is like that of clouds embracing the moon, hence the name Fullmoon Egg.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.

Variants.Name: Delicious Fullmoon Egg
Variants.Description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. Take a bite while it's hot, and have your tastebuds savor the tender minced meat and delicious juice, an experience which is then topped off with a finishing touch of sweet prawn. Before your eyes, you can almost see a full moon over rippling waters, a fishing boat by the shore, and the fishermen's songs echoing down the years.
Variants.Effect: Revives a character and restores 1500 HP.

Variants.Name: Suspicious Minty Meat Rolls
Variants.Description: A sour-and-spicy dish. The saltiness of the dipping sauce has completely covered the fresh flavor of the dish. If you don't wish to dilute it with water, then you'll just have to scarf it down with a big mouthful of rice.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Minty Meat Rolls
Variants.Description: A sour-and-spicy dish. The marinated meat has been thinly sliced and rolled into the mint leaves, before being brushed with a sauce blend containing Jueyun Chilis. The unique mint flavor adds the finishing touch to this dish, turning it into an excellent addition to any cold platter.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Minty Meat Rolls
Variants.Description: A sour-and-spicy dish. The meat and mint are in exquisite equilibrium, tender and not greasy, delicate and not bitter. The spiciness awakens the twain's poetic balance with startling clarity as it leaps in your mouth, only to close with a sigh of perfection.
Variants.Effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Cured Pork Dry Hotpot
Variants.Description: A dish fried over a great flame. The quality of the pork is fair enough, but it is far too salty. Have a piece of this, and you will taste nothing but brine in your mouth no matter how many Snapdragons or Matsutake mushrooms you consume.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Cured Pork Dry Hotpot
Variants.Description: A dish fried over a great flame. Matsutake and Ham have been sliced up, stir-fried, and garnished with some spicy condiments. The flavor of the Ham is a match for the Matsutake's crispness, and the combination grows ever lovelier and more addictive as you chew. The heat-conducting wok also serves to keep it piping hot for long periods.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 15% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Delicious Cured Pork Dry Hotpot
Variants.Description: A dish fried over a great flame. The rendered fat from the fried ham layers the side dishes perfectly, and the flavors have long permeated the whole dish. Its shine alone is enough to whet one's appetite, and every bite is sure to evoke memories of house, home, and celebration in anyone from Liyue.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Suspicious Stir-Fried Shrimp
Variants.Description: A mild and luscious dish. In an overzealous attempt to prevent the food from sticking to the bottom of the pot, too much oil was added. Despite having been subjected to this rather heavy-duty frying process, the shrimp still have a surprisingly pleasant texture — but mind you don't eat too many, or you'll get a sore throat.
Variants.Effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

Variants.Name: Stir-Fried Shrimp
Variants.Description: A mild and luscious dish. The shrimp are quickly sautéed and the sauce thickened. This method of cooking is exceedingly simple and brings out the wonderful natural flavor of the shrimp meat, granting it a place in humble home-cooked dinners and lavish banquets alike.
